org.jetel.util.primitive

Class BitArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.primitive.BitArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BitArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for representing strings of bits.
    Uses arrays of bytes to group bits by 8 together. Uses bit manipulation operations for fast access to individual bits. Once created, the bit array can't be extended (shorten or prolonged).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
